post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Toronto Area - Downtown, Ontario, Canada
We are currently recruiting mainframe resources to join our organization on a full time permanent basis. The opportunities will be located in Waterloo, Ontario.

As a consultant within CGI, you will be based on client site delivering high quality solutions based on our client business objectives.

We are looking for Senior Mainframe Systems Analysts and Senior Mainframe Programmer Analysts.

Our ideal candidate will possess a bachelors degree in Computer Science or Information Systems. You must have 6+ years of Development and/or Systems experience in a Mainframe environment using COBOL, DB2, JCL, extensive experience in application testing and UAT with a strong knowledge of Software development methodology.

Applicants must have excellent communication and presentation skills. Ability to work in a consulting environment

CGI is the fourth largest independent information technology services firm in North America providing end-to-end IT services and business solutions to more than 3,000 clients worldwide. CGI provides a full range of IT services, including consulting, systems integration, and the management of business and IT functions.

This is a great opportunity to join a winning team. CGI is the fourth largest independent information technology services firm in North America providing end-to-end IT services and business solutions to more than 3,000 clients worldwide. CGI provides a full range of IT services, including consulting, systems integration, and the management of business and IT functions.

CGI offers a competitive compensation package with opportunities for growth and professional development. Benefits for this position start day one and includes a minimum of 3 weeks vacation, profit sharing and a stock purchase plan. We are an equal opportunity employer.

We wish to thank all applicants for their interest and effort in applying for this position; however, only candidates selected for interviews will be contacted.

No unsolicited agency referrals please.

Must Have Skills

Cobol
JCL
CICS
DB2
Testing
System Analysis
post.title: FUTURE- Mainframe P/A and S/A
